channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Team Behind ‘Iron Saga VS’ Talks About Their Love Of Super Robots
item.description: Infusing the style and pathos of the Super Robot Wars games into a cogent 2D fighting game, 'Iron Saga VS' definitely stood out.

item.title: Man Sues After ChatGPT Accuses Him Of Killing His Children
item.description: ChatGPT is under fire for inaccurate results once again - this time, for the 'hallucination' that a father murdered his children.

item.title: Building A Future-Proof Data Strategy: A Roadmap For Tech Leaders
item.description: Many enterprises are struggling with data silos, regulatory complexities and the rapid evolution of AI and analytics.
